title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Bargain Floor’s profit will be $250.
The response states that Bargain Floor’s profit will be $250.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not identify that Bargain floor has a dominant strategy to include the shoes in its sales flyer.
The response identifies that Bargain floor has a dominant strategy to include the shoes in its sales flyer.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The response must use numbers from the table in the explanation in order to receive the point.
descriptions: The response does not explain that both stores choosing not to include the shoes in their respective flyers is not a Nash equilibrium because Bargain Floor has an incentive to move to including the shoes in its sale, earning $30 more ( $250>$220 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2Caerbd9wDYL wzYbItLDharmWu51MyVXgaruavP1wzZbItLDhis9wBH5garqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaaeaadaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaGGKaGaaGOmaiaaiwdacaaIWaGaeyOpa4JaaiijaiaaikdacaaI YaGaaGimaaaa@3CD5@ ).

The response explains that both stores choosing not to include the shoes in their respective flyers is not a Nash equilibrium because Bargain Floor has an incentive to move to including the shoes in its sale, earning $30 more ( $250>$220 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2Caerbd9wDYL wzYbItLDharmWu51MyVXgaruavP1wzZbItLDhis9wBH5garqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaaeaadaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaGGKaGaaGOmaiaaiwdacaaIWaGaeyOpa4JaaiijaiaaikdacaaI YaGaaGimaaaa@3CD5@ ).

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not identify the Nash equilibrium as both stores choosing to include the shoes in their sales flyers.
The response identifies the Nash equilibrium as both stores choosing to include the shoes in their sales flyers.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that the outcome will change and/or explain that by both stores by agreeing to not include their shoes in their sales flyers, they would both increase their profits.
The response states that the outcome will change and explains that by both stores agreeing to not include their shoes in their sales flyers, they would both increase their profits.
